## Source: ossf-package-analysis (14bf109f34ed2a77090e261e001bc285f9e3c59006cb9c2ccf14f34fda5ff61e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'xk6-top' @ 10.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
